washAndIron.title: Wash & Iron Service
washAndIron.description: Professional washing and ironing services for your garments

pricingItems.name: Basic Wash & Iron
pricingItems.description: Professional washing and precise ironing for everyday garments.

pricingItems.name: Express Service
pricingItems.description: Quick turnaround for when you need your clothes faster.

pricingItems.name: Premium Care
pricingItems.description: Extra attention for formal and delicate garments requiring special care.

processSteps.title: Collection & Sorting
processSteps.description: We collect your garments and carefully sort them by fabric type, color, and washing requirements.

processSteps.title: Washing & Treatment
processSteps.description: Your clothes are washed with premium detergents at the optimal temperature, with stain treatment as needed.

processSteps.title: Professional Ironing
processSteps.description: Each item is professionally ironed with precision, paying special attention to collars, cuffs, and pleats.

processSteps.title: Quality Check & Delivery
processSteps.description: After a thorough quality inspection, your fresh, crisp garments are neatly packaged for delivery.
